PrincipalAmountOutstandingOnLoansSecurit.description: This is the principal amount outstanding for securitized loans only (across all types of loans).

ProceedsFromCollectionOfFinanceReceivabl.label: Proceeds from Collection of Finance Receivables
ProceedsFromCollectionOfFinanceReceivabl.description: The cash inflow associated with the collection of receivables arising from the financing of goods and services.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommercialPaper.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Commercial Paper
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommercialPaper.description: The cash inflow from borrowing by issuing commercial paper.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfMediumTermNotes.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Medium-term Notes
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfMediumTermNotes.description: The cash inflow from a debt funding received on a regular basis with maturities ranging from 5-10 years.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfSecuredDebt.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Secured Debt
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfSecuredDebt.description: The cash inflow from amounts received from issuance of long-term debt that is wholly or partially secured by collateral. Excludes proceeds from tax exempt secured debt.

ProceedsFromLeasesHeldForInvestment.label: Proceeds from Leases Held-for-investment
ProceedsFromLeasesHeldForInvestment.description: The cash inflow from the sale of a lease held for investment, which may be a lease of real estate, equipment or other fixed assets for a specified time in exchange for payment, usually in the form of rent.

ProceedsFromOtherShortTermDebt.label: Proceeds from Other Short-term Debt
ProceedsFromOtherShortTermDebt.description: Amount of cash inflow from short-term debt classified as other.

ProceedsFromRelatedPartyDebt.label: Proceeds from Related Party Debt
ProceedsFromRelatedPartyDebt.description: The cash inflow from a long-term borrowing made from related parties where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth. Alternate caption: Proceeds from Advances from Affiliates.

ProceedsFromSaleOfFinanceReceivables.label: Proceeds from Sale of Finance Receivables
ProceedsFromSaleOfFinanceReceivables.description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of receivables arising from the financing of goods and services.

ProceedsFromSaleOfPropertyPlantAndEquipm.label: Proceeds from Sale of Property, Plant, and Equipment
ProceedsFromSaleOfPropertyPlantAndEquipm.description: The cash inflow from the sale of long-lived, physical assets that are used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale.

ProceedsFromShortTermDebt.label: Proceeds from Short-term Debt
ProceedsFromShortTermDebt.description: The cash inflow from a borrowing having initial term of repayment within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

ProfitLoss.label: Net Income (Loss), Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
ProfitLoss.description: The consolidated profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, including the portion attributable to the noncontrolling interest.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentNet.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Net
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentNet.description: Amount after accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, and furniture and fixtures.

PropertySubjectToOrAvailableForOperating.label: Property Subject to or Available for Operating Lease, Accumulated Depreciation
PropertySubjectToOrAvailableForOperating.description: The amount of accumulated depreciation, by major property class, recorded on property subject to or available for lease as of the balance sheet date.

PropertySubjectToOrAvailableForOperating.label: Property Subject to or Available for Operating Lease, Gross
PropertySubjectToOrAvailableForOperating.description: Amount before accumulated depreciation of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services subject to or available for lease.

PropertySubjectToOrAvailableForOperating.label: Property Subject to or Available for Operating Lease, Net
PropertySubjectToOrAvailableForOperating.description: The amount of property, by major property class, net of accumulated depreciation, subject to or available for lease as of the balance sheet date.

ProvisionForLoanAndLeaseLosses.label: Provision for Loan and Lease Losses
ProvisionForLoanAndLeaseLosses.description: Amount of expense related to estimated loss from loan and lease transactions.

ProvisionForLoanLossesExpensed.label: Financing Receivable, Credit Loss, Expense (Reversal)
ProvisionForLoanLossesExpensed.description: Amount of credit loss expense (reversal of expense) for financing receivable.

RecognitionOfDeferredRevenue.label: Recognition of Deferred Revenue
RecognitionOfDeferredRevenue.description: The amount of previously reported deferred or unearned revenue that was recognized as revenue during the period. For cash flows, this element primarily pertains to amortization of deferred credits on long-term arrangements. As a noncash item, it is deducted from net income when calculating cash provided by or used in operations using the indirect method.

RelatedPartyTransactionOtherRevenuesFrom.label: Related Party Transaction, Other Revenues from Transactions with Related Party
RelatedPartyTransactionOtherRevenuesFrom.description: Reflects the sum of all other revenue and income realized from sales and other transactions (excluding transactions that are eliminated in consolidated or combined financial statements) with related party during the period.

RepaymentsOfCommercialPaper.label: Repayments of Commercial Paper
RepaymentsOfCommercialPaper.description: The cash outflow due to repaying amounts borrowed by issuing commercial paper.

RepaymentsOfMediumTermNotes.label: Repayments of Medium-term Notes
RepaymentsOfMediumTermNotes.description: The cash outflow to pay off borrowing used to receive debt funding on a regular basis with maturities ranging from 5-10 years.

RepaymentsOfOtherShortTermDebt.label: Repayments of Other Short-term Debt
RepaymentsOfOtherShortTermDebt.description: Amount of cash outflow for the payment of debt classified as other, maturing within one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

RepaymentsOfRelatedPartyDebt.label: Repayments of Related Party Debt
RepaymentsOfRelatedPartyDebt.description: The cash outflow for the payment of a long-term borrowing made from a related party where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth. Alternate caption: Payments for Advances from Affiliates.

RepaymentsOfSecuredDebt.label: Repayments of Secured Debt
RepaymentsOfSecuredDebt.description: The cash outflow to repay long-term debt that is wholly or partially secured by collateral. Excludes repayments of tax exempt secured debt.

RepaymentsOfShortTermDebt.label: Repayments of Short-term Debt
RepaymentsOfShortTermDebt.description: The cash outflow for a borrowing having initial term of repayment within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

RestrictedCash.label: Restricted Cash
RestrictedCash.description: Amount of cash restricted as to withdrawal or usage. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits.

RestrictedCashAndCashEquivalents.label: Restricted Cash and Cash Equivalents
RestrictedCashAndCashEquivalents.description: Amount of cash and cash equivalents restricted as to withdrawal or usage. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit.label: Retained Earnings (Accumulated Deficit)
RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit.description: The cumulative amount of the reporting entity's undistributed earnings or deficit.

RevenueFromRelatedParties.label: Revenue from Related Parties
RevenueFromRelatedParties.description: Amount of revenue, fees and commissions earned from transactions between (a) a parent company and its subsidiaries; (b) subsidiaries of a common parent; (c) an entity and trusts for the benefit of employees, for example, but not limited to, pension and profit-sharing trusts that are managed by or under the trusteeship of the entity's management; (d) an entity and its principal, owners, management, or members of their immediate families; and (e) affiliates.

Revenues.label: Revenues
Revenues.description: Amount of revenue recognized from goods sold, services rendered, insurance premiums, or other activities that constitute an earning process. Includes, but is not limited to, investment and interest income before deduction of interest expense when recognized as a component of revenue, and sales and trading gain (loss).

SecuredDebt.label: Secured Debt
SecuredDebt.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date, including the current and noncurrent portions, of collateralized debt obligations (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle, if longer). Such obligations include mortgage loans, chattel loans, and any other borrowings secured by assets of the borrower.

SecurityDepositLiability.label: Security Deposit Liability
SecurityDepositLiability.description: This element represents money paid in advance to protect the provider of a product or service, such as a lessor, against damage or nonpayment by the buyer or tenant (lessee) during the term of the agreement. Such damages may include physical damage to the property, theft of property, and other contractual breaches. Security deposits held may be interest or noninterest bearing.

ShortTermBorrowings.label: Short-term Debt
ShortTermBorrowings.description: Reflects the total carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of debt having initial terms less than one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

StateAndLocalIncomeTaxExpenseBenefitCont.label: State and Local Income Tax Expense (Benefit), Continuing Operations
StateAndLocalIncomeTaxExpenseBenefitCont.description: Amount of state and local current and deferred income tax expense (benefit) attributable to continuing operations.

StockholdersEquity.label: Stockholders' Equity Attributable to Parent
StockholdersEquity.description: Total of all stockholders' equity (deficit) items, net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity which are attributable to the parent. The amount of the economic entity's stockholders' equity attributable to the parent excludes the amount of stockholders' equity which is allocable to that ownership interest in subsidiary equity which is not attributable to the parent (noncontrolling interest, minority interest). This excludes temporary equity and is sometimes called permanent equity.

StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttrib.label: Stockholders' Equity, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttrib.description: Amount of stockholders' equity (deficit), net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity, attributable to both the parent and noncontrolling interests. Amount excludes temporary equity. Alternate caption for the concept is permanent equity.

TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017ChangeInTaxRateIn.label: Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, Change in Tax Rate, Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017ChangeInTaxRateIn.description: Amount of income tax expense (benefit) for remeasurement of deferred tax from change in tax rate pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act.

TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017TransitionTaxForA.label: Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, Transition Tax for Accumulated Foreign Earnings, Income Tax Expense
TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017TransitionTaxForA.description: Amount of income tax expense from transition tax on accumulated earnings of controlled foreign corporation deemed repatriated pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act.

TaxesPayableCurrentAndNoncurrent.label: Taxes Payable
TaxesPayableCurrentAndNoncurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable for statutory income, sales, use, payroll, excise, real, property and other taxes.

TranslationAdjustmentFunctionalToReporti.label: Translation Adjustment Functional to Reporting Currency, Increase (Decrease), Gross of Tax
TranslationAdjustmentFunctionalToReporti.description: Amount of cumulative translation gain (loss), before tax, from translating foreign currency financial statements into the reporting currency.

UndistributedEarningsOfForeignSubsidiari.label: Undistributed Earnings of Foreign Subsidiaries
UndistributedEarningsOfForeignSubsidiari.description: Amount of undistributed earnings of foreign subsidiaries intended to be permanently reinvested outside the country of domicile.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Decrease Resulting from Prior Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.description: Amount of decrease in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions taken in prior period tax returns.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Decrease Resulting from Settlements with Taxing Authorities
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.description: Amount of decrease in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from settlements with taxing authorities.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Increase Resulting from Current Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.description: Amount of increase in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions that have been or will be taken in current period tax return.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Increase Resulting from Prior Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.description: Amount of increase in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions taken in prior period tax returns.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsInterestOnIncomeT.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Interest on Income Taxes Accrued
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsInterestOnIncomeT.description: Amount of interest expense accrued for an underpayment of income taxes.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsInterestOnIncomeT.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Interest on Income Taxes Expense
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsInterestOnIncomeT.description: Amount of interest expense for an underpayment of income taxes.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsReductionsResulti.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Reduction Resulting from Lapse of Applicable Statute of Limitations
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsReductionsResulti.description: Amount of decrease in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from lapses of applicable statutes of limitations.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsThatWouldImpactEf.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits that Would Impact Effective Tax Rate
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsThatWouldImpactEf.description: The total amount of unrecognized tax benefits that, if recognized, would affect the effective tax rate.

UnsecuredDebt.label: Unsecured Debt
UnsecuredDebt.description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, carrying value as of the balance sheet date of uncollateralized debt obligations (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer).

DividendsPayableCurrentAndNoncurrent.label: Dividends Payable
DividendsPayableCurrentAndNoncurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of dividends declared but unpaid on equity securities issued by the entity and outstanding.

ShortTermInvestments.label: Short-term Investments
ShortTermInvestments.description: Amount of investments including trading securities, available-for-sale securities, held-to-maturity securities, and short-term investments classified as other and current.
